title: Chocolate Orange Extra Large Honeycomb Melts (x3)
description:
*WARNING - THIS IS NOT A FOOD PRODUCT

 

Our honeycomb wax melts come in sets of three. 

 

Each melt can be reused until its scent fades.  Keep remaining melts in an airtight container to keep them at their best.

 

Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

title: Lemongrass three wick hand poured candle

title: Replacement reeds (x7)
description: Seven replacement fibre reeds in grey. We recommend reeds are changed every 6-12 months and for each new fragrance.

title: Reed Diffuser Refill
description:
A more wallet and eco friendly way to refill your Bee Happy diffuser is here! 

Available in all of our fragrances, these 100% recyclable bottles (glass bottle/aluminium lid) contain approximately 100g of diffuser refill (the same amount as in our complete reed diffusers). These can also be used as stand alone diffusers depending on the look you want to achieve. 

Reeds are available for purchase separately.  We recommend reeds are changed every 6-12 months to maintain good fragrance throw.

title: Mystery Box £50
description:
Want a lovely surprise for yourself or someone else? 

Our mystery boxes have got you covered. Each box will contain hand picked luxury items with a retail value of £50 or more. Some items may be exclusively available in mystery boxes. Items may come from any of our product ranges and fragrances. 

Please add a note to your order if there is a type of product or a specific fragrances you do not wish to receive.

title: Seashell Candle Duo
description:
Bring a bit of the seaside home with our seashell candle duo.   Made from the highest quality vegan and cruelty free biodegradable wax, and using a cotton core wick, you can enjoy our treats with a clear conscience.
 
Available in white, pink, grey, lilac and blue (please add a note to your order specifying colour)

title: Zen Melt Warmer
description:
Add some zen to your home fragrance regime with our lovely melt warmer.  Add a lit tea light to the base of the warmer, place your chosen melt or snap bar section to the bowl of the warmer and wait for the scent to fill the room.

 

Always follow safety labels and care instructions provided.

Always follow wax melt care instructions.

title: Owl Candle
description:
Put some quirkyness into your home decor with our owl candle.

Available in a variety of colours. Please select your chosen colour below.

We use only the highest quality wax which is biodegradable, vegan and cruelty free.

title: Bubble Candle
description:
Funk up your home decor with our cute bubble candle. Available in pink, grey and white (please select colour below).  Please note that this candle does not have a container and will need to be placed on a candle tray or plate before burning.

 

We use only the highest quality biodegrade wax which is vegan, cruelty free and biodegradable.

title: Sage & Sea Salt hand poured tinned candle
description:
Our Sage & Sea Salt fragrance is reminiscent of waves breaking white, the air fresh with sea salt and spray. Alive with the mineral scent of the rugged cliffs. Mingling with the woody earthiness of sage. 
 
Comes in its own tin with lid to keep your candle at its best for longer and protect it from dust.
 
Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

Approximate candle content 200g

title: Pomegranate Dusk hand poured tinned candle
description:
Our Pomegranate Dusk fragrance has top notes of juicy red fruits, reminiscent of pomegranate, giving a lusciously refreshing quality. Floral blend heart notes conjure the heady, spicy character of Casablanca lily. Base notes of temptingly smoky wood weave through the fragrance, creating an aura of sensuality. A classic high quality fragrance. 
 
Comes in its own tin with lid to keep your candle at its best for longer and protect it from dust.
 
Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

Approximate candle content 200g

title: Pear & Freesia hand poured tinned candle
description:
Our Pear & Freesia fragrance features pear, combined with quince which introduces honey sweetness, and is surrounded with white freesia and wild climbing rose. Base notes of green, fresh and sour nuances of rhubarb along with warm and subtle aromas of patchouli, amber and white musk.
 
Comes in its own tin with lid to keep your candle at its best for longer and protect it from dust.
 
Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

Approximate candle content 200g

title: Fresh Linen hand poured tinned candle
description:
Our Fresh Linen fragrance is a beautifully clean scent, reminiscent of freshly laundered fluffy towels. 
 
Comes in its own tin with lid to keep your candle at its best for longer and protect it from dust.
 
 
Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

Approximate candle content 200g

title: Blackberry & Bay hand poured tinned candle
description:
Our Blackberry & Bay fragrance features grapefruit, floral notes, vetiver, cedar, a burst of blackberry juice and bay leaf. 
 
Comes in its own tin with lid to keep your candle at its best for longer and protect it from dust.
 
Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

title: Vanilla Extra Large Honeycomb Melts (x3)
description:
Our honeycomb wax melts come in sets of three.

 

Inspired by the classic French way of making ice cream using an egg-custard base, this fragrance initially exudes a strong and prominent smell associated with lemon cream and absolute blossom that is then enhanced by light undertones of raw vanilla and tonka bean followed by a delightful trace aftertaste of french vanilla and amber.

 

We use only the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and can take a high fragrance oil load for great scent throw. Each melt can be used and reused until the scent fades.

title: Pomegranate Dusk Extra Large Honeycomb Melts (x3)
description:
Our honeycomb wax melts come in sets of three. 

 

Our Pomegranate Dusk fragrance has top notes of juicy red fruits, reminiscent of pomegranate, giving a lusciously refreshing quality. Floral blend heart notes conjure the heady, spicy character of Casablanca lily. Base notes of temptingly smoky wood weave through the fragrance, creating an aura of sensuality A classic high quality fragrance.

 

Each melt can be reused until its scent fades. Keep remaining melts in an airtight container to keep them at their best. Each pack will contain five assorted shapes (hearts, stars and seashells).

 

Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

title: Pear & Freesia Extra Large Honeycomb Melts (x3)
description:
Our honeycomb wax melts come in sets of three.

 

Our Pear & Freesia fragrance features pear, combined with quince which introduces honey sweetness, and is surrounded with white freesia and wild climbing rose. Base notes of green, fresh and sour nuances of rhubarb along with warm and subtle aromas of patchouli, amber and white musk.

 

Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

 

Each melt can be reused until its scent fades.  Keep remaining melts in an airtight container to keep them at their best.

title: Wax melt starter set
description: Our wax melt starter set is a ready to go complete kit including melt warmer, six unscented tea lights, two chunky snap bars, six extra large honeycomb melts and six heart melts. Fragrances can be requested by leaving a note on the order, otherwise they will be chosen for you and each set will include six different fragrances.

title: Beehive Candle (Set of 4)
description:
Bring a little cheer to your home fragrance regime with our quirky little beehive candle. Made with high quality biodegradable wax which is vegan and cruelty free, there is no sting in the tail of these little cuties.

 

Please choose your colour below.

title: Amber Noir Chunky Snap Bar
description:
Our chunky snap bars come in five sections, simply snap off a section and use in the same way as a wax melt. Made from specialist high performance melt wax, and the highest quality fragrance oils, each section can be used and reused until the scent fades.

 

Available in all of our fragrances.

title: Amber Noir Extra Large Honeycomb Melts (x3)
description: Our honeycomb wax melts come in sets of three.  Made from specialist high performance melt wax and the highest quality fragrance oils, all of which are vegan and cruelty free, the melts can be used and reused until the scent fades. Available in all of our fragrances.

title: Wax Melt/Snap Bar Mystery Postal Box - including P&P
description: Each mystery box contains six sets of melts or six snap bars from our standard size range.  Fragrances will be chosen at random but boxes will include no more than one set of melts or snap bar in any one fragrance.  Price includes P&P - use code 'mystery21' at checkout.

title: Chocolate Orange Reed Diffuser
description:

Our Chocolate Orange fragrance has base notes of cocoa and a zesty burst of orange.  A warming, sweet scent which is true to its name...just don't eat it!
 
Each diffuser comes with seven reeds and should last between 3-4 months depending on the temperature of your home and the regularity with which you turn your reeds.
 
All of our products are 100% vegan and cruelty free.

title: Vanilla three wick hand poured candle
description:
Inspired by the classic French way of making ice cream using an egg-custard base, this fragrance initially exudes a strong and prominent smell associated with lemon cream and absolute blossom that is then enhanced by light undertones of raw vanilla and tonka bean followed by a delightful trace aftertaste of french vanilla and amber.

Presented in a large glass candle bowl our three wick candle is a showstopper.  
 
Please note these candles are made to order and therefore should be left to fully cure for 1-2 weeks following delivery to ensure longevity and proper scent throw.

Approximate candle content 500g.

title: Unscented tea lights (x12)
description:
Perfect with our wax melt burners, our tea lights are 100% vegan and cruelty free.  Made from biodegradable specialist tea light wax and presented in aluminium cases and recyclable cardboard packaging, they are also more eco friendly than the majority of 'bulk buy' tea light candles on the market.

 

Each tealight should burn for 3/4 hours when candle care advice is followed.

title: Hamper Giftwrapping
description:
Turn your order into a hamper!

 

Each hamper will be presented in a large gold and red premium, glossy card, snowflake hamper tray.  Wrapped with biodegradable and compostable cellophane and finished with a large gold ribbon bow.  Gift tags are available with your choice of message for postage direct to the recipient.

 

Hamper giftwrapping is available on any order (tray measurements one size: 35cm x 24cm x 8cm).  Please note that for postal delivery the hamper cellophane will be wrapped flat with the bow stuck on the top to avoid damage and during transit.

title: Bowl wax melt burner (white)
description:
This simple wax burner is perfect for use with our wax melt range.  Just pop a tealight inside, light it and wait for your wax to melt and the room to fill with your chosen scent.

 

Wax melts/snap bars not included.

 

Also available as part of our burner and melt bundle.

title: Owl wax melt burner (black)
description:
Our lovely little owl wax melt burner is perfect for use with our wax melt range.  Just pop a tealight inside, light it and wait for your wax to melt and fill the room with your chosen scent.

 

Wax melts/snap bars not included.

 

Also available in white and as part of our burner and melts bundle.

title: Owl wax melt burner (white)
description:

Wax melts/snap bars not included.

 

Also available in black and as part of our burner and melt bundle.

title: Fig & Cassis hand poured tinned candle
description:
Our Wild Fig & Cassis scent top notes are cassis, cherry, grass and fig; middle notes are hyacinth, cyclamen, jasmine and pine tree; base notes are patchouli, cedar, amber and musk.   A classic high quality fragrance. 
 
Comes in its own tin with lid to keep your candle at its best for longer and protect it from dust.
 
Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

Approximate candle content 200g

title: Amber Noir hand poured snap bar (x1)
description:
Our soy wax snap bars are available in our entire range of fragrances.

 

Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality soy wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

 

Each section of your snap bar can be reused until its scent fades.  Keep remaining sections of snap bar in an airtight container to keep them at their best.

title: Baby Powder hand poured tinned candle
description:
Our Baby Powder fragranced candle has a sweet, clean, soothing scent which is true to its name.
 
Comes in its own tin with lid to keep your candle at its best and protected from dust.
 
Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

Approximated candle content 200g

title: Amber Noir hand poured tinned candle
description:
Our most luxurious candle, the Amber Noir fragrance is subtle, warm and intoxicating, enhanced by notes of luxury spice, dark balsamic fruits and sensual exotic forests.  Comes in its own tin with lid to keep your candle at its best and protect it from dust.
 
Also available in our wax melt range.
 
Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality soy wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.
 
We use the Wedo eco wick, which is a flat, coreless and self trimming wick made of pure cotton interlaced with thin papers filaments for a more stable and consistent burn with reduced carbon build up, smoke and soot than other wicks.

Approximate candle content 200g

title: Lime, Basil & Mandarin hand poured tinned candle
description:
The Lime, Basil & Mandarin fragrance has notes of peppery basil and aromatic white thyme which brings an unexpected twist to the scent of limes on a Caribbean breeze.  A contemporary and luxuriously clean scent which is perfect for the longer spring and summer evenings. 

 

Comes in its own silver tin with lid to keep your candle at its best and protect it from dust.

 

Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

title: Vanilla hand poured tinned candle
description:
Inspired by the classic French way of making ice cream using an egg-custard base, this fragrance initially exudes a strong and prominent smell associated with lemon cream and absolute blossom that is then enhanced by light undertones of raw vanilla and tonka bean followed by a delightful trace aftertaste of french vanilla and amber.
 
We use only the finest quality biodegradable wax which can take a high fragrance oil load to give great scent throw. 
 
Comes in its own  tin with lid to keep your candle at its best for longer and protect it from dust.

Approximate candle content 200g

title: Chocolate Orange hand poured tinned candle
description:
* WARNING - THIS IS NOT A FOOD PRODUCT*
 
Our Chocolate Orange fragrance has base notes of cocoa and a zesty burst of orange.  A warming, sweet scent which is true to its name...just don't eat it! 
 
Comes in its own tin with lid to keep your candle at its best for longer and protect it from dust.
 
Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

Approximate candle content 200g

title: Lavender & Chamomile hand poured tinned candle
description: Our Lavender & Chamomile scent offers a refreshing blend of eucalyptus and lavender with camphoraceous and lime top notes.  A calming and relaxing fragrance which is perfect for the bedroom.  Comes in its own silver tin with lid to keep your candle at its best for longer and protect it from dust. Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.Approximate candle content 200g

title: Amber Noir hand poured wax melts (x5)
description:
Our wax melts are available in all of our standard scents.  Each pack will contain five assorted shapes (hearts, stars and seashells).

 

Our entire range is vegan, cruelty free and made with the finest quality soy wax which is biodegradable and suitable for a high fragrance load to give you a great scent throw.

 

Each melt can be reused several times until the scent fades.  Keep remaining melts in an airtight container to keep them at their best.
